SEARCH
Package main.devices.wireless

Class Wifi

java.lang.Object
main.core.Device
main.devices.wireless.WirelessIO
main.devices.wireless.Wifi
public class Wifi extends WirelessIO
Wifi class that extends the WirelessIO class. Represents an Wifi wirelessio device that uses SPI or UART protocol.

  • Constructor Details

    • Wifi

      public Wifi(Protocol protocol, int devId)
      Constructs an Wifi device with the specified protocol and device ID. Ensures the protocol is an instance of SPI or UART for this Wifi device.
      Parameters:
      protocol - The protocol used by the Wifi device (must be SPI or UART).
      devId - The unique identifier for the Wifi device.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the protocol is not an instance of SPI or UART.

  • Method Details

    • turnOn

      public void turnOn()
      Turns on the wifi wirelessio. The device state is changed to State.ON, and a "turnON" command is sent via the protocol.
      Specified by:
      turnOn in class Device
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the wifi is already on.

    • turnOff

      public void turnOff()
      Turns off the wifi wirelessio. The device state is changed to State.OFF, and a "turnOFF" command is sent via the protocol.
      Specified by:
      turnOff in class Device
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the wifi is already off.

    • getDevId

      public int getDevId()
      Returns the unique identifier of the Wifi device.
      Specified by:
      getDevId in class Device
      Returns:
      The device ID of the Wifi.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the wifi device.
      Specified by:
      getName in class Device
      Returns:
      The name of the Wifi, which is "Wifi" for this class.
